Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the upcoming Australian Federal Budget with many expressing disappointment in the lack of commitment to jobseeker rate increases. Homelessness Australia and GPs are calling for more support for vulnerable communities while the LNP is demanding funding for Rockhampton's Ring Road. Harsh words have also been thrown around with a direct attack from one individual towards AlboMP and others using strong language to describe current challenges. The push for a JobSeeker rate increase continues unabated with committees urging substantial hikes ahead of the Federal Budget.
